Text: Extremely sad, indeed. One of the few widely recognizable voices of ALL TIME.

Brad's voice has been the soundtrack of my youth and I'm gutted to realise he has killed himself for whatever reason.  There's talk of him constanly 'giving' and being 'tired' and needing 'peace' so where were his true friends to pull him away from the edge?
It strikes me that at 55 he might have wanted to slow down a bit but with such a huge talent like his there was always a constant demand for his time and he was too nice to say no
Thanks adw, i have wanted a live record from Boston since i saw them on the first concert i Europe in hovet stockholm in 79,, so thanks man!!!!
glad to oblige and this is the best sounding live recording i've heard so far, raw but very powerful.  brad will be missed.
HI1! They Are The Best Rock `nÂ´Roll Band In The World!!!
This is THE show to download if you want to hear Boston at their peak in CD quality
Thanks for the rip. Boston is one of the greatest of all time and Brad was the ulitimate lead singer.

Thank You! I cannot wait to hear this as it sounds like its excellent recording. Not too much live Boston out there so this is a real treat!

Kit
Oh yeah, anyway we could get this in FLAC? now THAT would be somethin' special
This kicks ass!  I'm a touring musician and have listened to and performed everything from classic Zeppelin to Death Metal, and man there will never be another band like Boston. Thanks so much.
